message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since I'm losing money each round.
Your share loses value each round Alice, let's split the difference of our last offers to end this quickly.
Okay, Bob, a little closer to the middle. It's my turn to propose next round, and it'll be worth even less then!
The clock is ticking, Alice.  This is a good deal for both of us considering the decreasing value.
Bob, we're getting close.  This is a fair deal given the time pressure.
